events.mixingItUp: Mixing it up with the community
events.text: The Remix Project team gives workshops about Remix as well as general introductions to the Ethereum ecosystem and its associated use cases. We can tailor our workshops to the technical knowledge and skill level of your particular group, and we try to give entertaining talks. Reach out to us by email, or on our Discord or Twitter.
